elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is generally referred to as an application?
elements.correctAnswer: Programs that are used for specific work (execute work instructions).

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What is the correct definition for the operating system?
elements.correctAnswer: System program(s), responsible for data and resource management as well as communication with users (operation of the PC and peripheral devices): Loading, executing, interrupting and terminating programs; managing and allocating processor time; managing internal memory space for applications; managing and operating connected devices

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is an integrated software package?
elements.correctAnswer: Several applications are offered in one package (e.g. with word processing, spreadsheets, image processing, database), including Microsoft 365.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What advantages do you see in an integrated software package?
elements.correctAnswer: are similarly structured (user interface); can be operated similarly (user interface, key combinations); compatible with each other

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What disadvantages do you see in an integrated software package?
elements.correctAnswer: often contain programs that are rarely or never needed (overloaded); graphics programs, video and sound editing programs are increasingly missing
